Fun and entertaining, for the highly skilled. This game takes dedication to get good at the game and many hours of playtime to know the maps, call outs, nades, etc. There is a lot of toxic people in casual, and you sometimes get bad team mates in competitive, especially in lower ranks. Just play with friends as it is a lot more fun and you'll get to know their habits and play better together. Overall a good game and worthy of my investment of many hours.
